title: The opening of Master Prynnes new book, called A vindication: or, light breaking out from a cloud of differences, or late controversies. Wherein are inferences upon the Vindication, and antiqueres to the queres; and by that, the way a little cleared to a further discovery of truth in a church-order, by a conference or discourse. / By John Saltmarsh, preacher at Brasteed in Kent. Published according to order.
author: Saltmarsh, John, d. 1647.
publisher: Printed for G. Calvert, at the signe of the Black Spred-Eagle, at the West-End of S. Pauls.,
